column4: oh boy... I'm trying to decide here wether I should install Kubuntu on my comp, I play mainly WoW and CS 1.6 and it's really important not to lose important, well WoW should be running lag free and CS @100 fps.. qry pls
WoW runs fine, I think CS should too, but I don't know for a fact.
why won't you have an internet connection?  (I imagine that'd be the first thing to figure out how to fix)
